name: Create a link for a new file in Egnyte and share it with specified people from list stored in Google Sheets
description:
When a new file is saved in Egnyte, Make checks which people should have access to the file in Google Sheets. [This template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aLhpyhKiE9iTni4Op8UNiRY3NskTRw4EUtFefPLdMJQ/edit?usp=sharing) in Google Sheets was used. All the files must have the naming convention "nameOfTheProject_nameOfTheFile". 
After the list of filtered people is retrieved, the file links are created for the people and the links are sent to their e-mails. The generated password is then sent in private message to the concrete people via Slack.
